update_content:
Release Info
- Version: 2.1.6

- Size: 15.5MB

- Filelinked code: 30837432

- Modded version(like Ad-free version) cant be auto updated. Please use official version(download at beetvapk.me) to support developer.



Change logs

- Improve subtitle text look

- Improve focus on TV landscape.

- Add One Player as an option when choose default player.

- Fix bugs.
